attributes.title: WARNING: DO NOT GET!!!!!!! trump 2020✨🧚‍♀️ on a gravestone❤️🥰✨
attributes.review:
as a fellow Karen, when i downloaded this app i obviously expected to be ✨e d u c a t e d✨ by our LOVELY 🍊orange🍊 bunker boy (as any other Karen should expect😂😂😂😂😂😂😂) and i was so excited🤟🤟!!!!!!!! but i was LET DOWN BY THIS APP. NONE OF THESE THINGS HAPPENED!!!!!!! INSTEAD..... beyoncé decided to show up and PEE in my microwave, POOPOO in all of my kitchen drawers and cabinets, and MAKE RAMEN IN MY TORLET!!! even though i did end up eating all of the ramen (highly recommend), something i would NOT RECOMMEND is this APP!!!!!!!! i also think i failed to mention that every device in my house started playing that song “IF I WERE A BOY” OVER AND OVER AND OVER throughout my whole home!!!! I HAVE A SIXTEEN YEAR OLD. THAT IS NOT APPROPRIATE FOR THEM AT ALL!!!!! AND EVERY TV (that were previously playing fox news for obvious reasons🤣🤣🤣) STARTED TO LEVITATE AND THEN WERE THROWN AT MY FACE!!!! i’m in the ICU now with about 745 stitches and every bone in my body is shattered. thanks trump😅

     - gen z

Donald Trump is by far the worst president we have ever had...and trust me, we’ve had some pretty bad ones come in office. I mean seriously, he is a JOKE. He should have stuck to business because he was actually good at that. If checks and balances wasn’t a thing, he’d have gone full dictator on us. No, covid 19 was not his fault but his response was and still is!!! And don’t even get me started on his encouragement towards the racism in the United States. I feel it especially as a person of color. The only argument his minions have to support him is that “he lowered taxes”...uhh yeah for the top 1%, not you sweetie. He hasn’t done anything productive and for the betterment of the United States. I swear, this man needs to get out of Office, for the sake of America. China isn’t our worst enemy, he is. This country (that was great before he got here) is crashing and burning thanks to him, and things won’t get better till he’s out of office. Thanks and God bless America.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP, RUINED MY LIFE
attributes.review: I got this to show my support for our wonderful, non-fascist, non-racist, spray tan sponsored president who has handled the current pandemic with such astounding grace. However, when I opened the app in my living room my family immediately attacked me. It seems as if this app intensifies the 5g radiation being emitted from my phone, as we all know that 5g can cause intense psychological damage to even the most clinically sane people. They lashed out at me, calling me “stupid,” “a waste of space,” “an ignorant piece of trash,” and worst of all, “Karen.” After all of their harsh words, my father grabbed the largest box he could find and began putting my stuff in it. At this point I closed the app and turned off my phone to try to bring them back to sanity, but it didn’t work. The trump 2020 app installed a virus to permanently emit 5g into the atmosphere. My parents kicked me out. I am homeless. Downloading this app RUINED MY LIFE. DO NOT DOWNLOAD IF YOU CARE ABOUT YOUR WELLBEING

attributes.title: TERRIBLE🤢
attributes.review: When i first opened the app it crashed so i tried two more time and my phone went all black. i then proceeded to power off my phone then power it on and my phones data was stolen. all my pictures, apps, passwords, EVERYTHING!!!!! I’m still upset and i don’t want the same to happen to you so please don’t download this. i only downloaded this app because my friend who supports trump told me to download it because there are funny pictures of trump on it. Guess what?! i never got to to see them!!!! Oh yea plus it’s like they have a secret software that they put on the phone or something because after all my data was erased all my wallpapers for my phone said TRUMP 2020. LIKE NOOOOOOOO. and it was like a whole virus on my phone. it also made me only be aloud to download trump apps. i am about to take it to apple to fix this problem and get back my data but please! take my word and DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. PLEASE. FOR YOUR SAFETY!!!!!!! Alr thanks🤢❤️

attributes.title: Trump is a disgrace😤🧚🏻
attributes.review: This app is disgusting who would even vote for a president like you, your a child predictor and a racist person. I don’t understand why you created this app. My mom sadly is a trump supporter she downloaded the app and her phone was all erased how disgusting can you get and you have the audacity to shut down TikTok that is the most popular app adults have it too, you notice that people will hate you more. Why even delete that app because your feeling got hurt boohoo get over it. And that’s not even all I myself download the app to see what that Cheeto had to say and I was asked to give my NUMBER so I did then after I was asked to give a lot of my private information then I deleted the app and 20 minutes later someone is ringing my doorbell and I see 5 orange minions practically BEGGING ME to download the app and give a 5 star review. I will be voting for you, to go to prison you big fat orange smelling fat Cheeto 🧚🏻🤪🌚

attributes.title: 🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: This app is constantly asking me to vote for Trump...This app is making me vote for Trump, if I don’t vote they said they will take matter into their own hands and personally come to my house and and bomb us...this app is a terrorist app...Trump and his administration are terrorist...they are harassing me that they will bomb my house if I don’t pledge to vote for Trump...I am scared for my life...This app is a nightmare...this app plays trumps voice out of no where at any tule of the day even when the app is closed...when I’m talking to my parents or anyone the app answers with a Trump voice and I’m honestly scared and fear for my app...I’ve tried deleting this app but it won’t delete and I know it’s not my phone because I’ve tried deleting other apps and they do delete...I’ve reset my entire phone to make it a new phone but when I restarted it, this app is downloaded and now part of my iPhone I’m so scared and confused .

attributes.title: This app changed me
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what the big fuss was about since EVERYONE I knew was RAVING about it. The moment I downloaded the app and opened it my screen went black and child porn started playing?? I was immediately disgusted then the screen switched to Donald trump and he SPIT into the camera and I don’t know how but I swear I felt the spit go INTO MY EYE and left me permanently blind in one eye. I am asian and ive always had quite the awful eyesight but now I’m one eye down and with my other “squinty eye” (as trump supporters like to say) I can barely live life at all. I keep bumping into walls and rocks (turns out I was actually at the border between the US and Mexico that this app transported me to) and I somehow can’t find any of the seasoning in my house anymore? I can only find ketchup and mayo😔 secretly disappointed in this app. I have to live with one eye and bland food with the images of child porn in my mind for the rest of my life.

attributes.title: 0/10 do not recommend
attributes.review:
Of course I downloaded this app!!!! I love trump!! My favorite child rapist, homophobic, transphobic, racist  white leader✨😏!!!  anyway I was very disappointed. It took a week to download which was super strange I have A LOT of storage. But I was willing to wait for my king✨✨❤️. as soon as I downloaded this app though it asked for my number and nobody has EVER asked for my number. when I have my number weird things started happening. I was getting sent very inappropriate pictures of children and god knows how they got my address I was still getting sent these pictures through the mail🤮🤮. and to top it all off I even got an invite to Mr Jeffrey Epstein's island!!!! I though he was dead. It’s super spooky to me really!! my grandparents have also been having problems with the app. I went to my friends house to see if they had a problem they kept getting weird messages like “i’m a master in the scene 
get all the in between 
when you lick on my nips 
my hips will griss 
guys wanna gimme that spleen 
so went u get all the in between 
boy get me up on my knees 
and when i scream and shout i gotta shake it out 
don’t stop 
he wanna pull on my hair all night 
imma take that dick with no fight” and a little picture of Mr trump tiny weenier. I sent deleted the app and do NOT recommend.. and if u do download the app well good luck Charlie ✨🤪❤️

attributes.title: 👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨
attributes.userName: S o U p & P o O p
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app at first, I was so, so excited to try at it out, but I soon became EXTREMELY disappointed.🤧🤧🤧 As soon as I opened the app, Trump and Mike Pence leaped out and started making out with my dog!!!! 😘🐶🐶I thought they were heterosexual, not DOGSEXUAL. We’ve all been lied to!!!!😡😡😡 Then they ripped off the limbs of each of my family members and captured my dog to be their dirty mistress!!!😱😱😱 We should warn their poor wives that they are cheating. Then, Mike Pence and Trump hooked up with each other!! 😍😍😍I wasn’t very shocked, because the only way someone could be THAT homophobic is if they themselves have internalized homophobia. They than ran off, after burning my whole house down along with all of my family. I was the only one to escape and all that is left of me now is my face, as I am typing this with my nose. 😭😭😭👃👃👃Needless to say I do NOT recommend this app under ANY CIRCUMSTANCES. 🙄🙄🙄😠😠😢😢😖😖

attributes.title: HORIBBLE 🤮🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review:
Once I opened this app I got instant  nausea because I saw my most amazing pumpkin 🎃 twerking off a ROCK ❗️❗️❗️ I cried and had to transfer all my fear 😱 anger 😡 annoyance 🙄 sadness 😢 pukiness 🤢 into a blue raspberry slushy from oh oh oh oh reilyyyyyys auto parts. I immediately deleted the app, only to figure out the pumpkin 🎃 had SPREAD 😱 the rest of my apps were of TWERKING PUMPKINS 🎃 😱 I started playing my absolute FAVE jojo siwa 🎀 song to console my emotions until I heard the pumpkin 🎃 TALKING INTO MY LEFT AIRPOD AHHHHHH. 👁👄👁 my right AirPod started BAWLING ITS EYES OUT because it was forgotten forever 😞 it fell out of my ear 👂, and into the rubbish bin 🗑 (where you belong) only to meet its SOULMATE the RUBBER ERASER ✏️ my left AirPod felt NEGLECTED 😩 And finally sent all its misery and sadness into eating. Now, thanks to this app my right AirPod is gone and my left AirPod has an eating disorder. I WANT TO SPEAK TO THE MANAGER! I EXPECT A REFUN 😡 AND FULL PAYMENT FOR THERAPHY FOR MY AIRPODS! 😡 they did not deserve this pain and misery 👁👄👁 
🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤
